title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
summary: Layers of pasta, roasted vegetables, ricotta cheese, and marinara sauce.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: French beef stew braised in red wine with carrots, mushrooms, and onions.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh vegetables, feta cheese, olives, and oregano with olive oil dressing.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
summary: Romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms, white wine, and parmesan cheese.

title: Fish Tacos
summary: Crispy fried fish in soft tortillas with cabbage slaw and creamy sauce.

title: Tiramisu
summary: Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

title: Butter Chicken
summary: Tender chicken in a rich tomato and butter sauce with Indian spices.

title: Caprese Salad
summary: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
